title: Future Android Feature Request...How to Hide Apps.
content:
Have loved and admired Pixel phones especially the computational powers of photo qualities even with a single lens. But I feel that Pixel's Android OS is missing one key feature.
What I'm talking about is the ability to hide apps and a safe & secure way to access them again similar to how Oxygen OS or MIUI implements it.
So, I do hope Pixel-Android developers and engineers try and not just emulate but enhance how hiding and finding apps is implemented on future. 
SO, LISTEN UP GOOGLE. TAKE ACTION PLEASE!!! Cheers.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
